noAccounts.title: No Accounts
noAccounts.message: You don't have any accounts yet.

noRecent.title: No Recent Recipients
noRecent.message: You haven't sent to anyone recently.

noSearchResults.title: No Results
noSearchResults.message: No accounts or contacts match your search

send.sameAddress: Cannot send to the same address
send.creator: Creator
send.title: Send
send.firstTimeSendMessage: We noticed this may be your first time sending to this address. Please confirm the destination address.
send.noNFTSelected: No NFT selected. Please go back and select an NFT to send.

nft.collectionEmpty: This collection doesn't contain any NFTs
nft.noCollectionSelected: No collection selected. Please go back and select an NFT collection.
nft.noAccountSelected: No account address available. Please select an account.

notFound.title: NFT Not Found
notFound.message: The requested NFT could not be found or loaded

warning.title: Storage Warning
warning.balance: Your account is below the minimum FLOW balance required for its storage usage, which may cause subsequent transactions to fail.
warning.storage: This action may fail because it may reduce the amount of FLOW in your account below what is required to cover its storage usage.
warning.storageAfterAction: Account balance will fall below the minimum FLOW required for storage after this transaction, causing this transaction to fail.

dialog.title: Account Compatibility
dialog.descriptionMain: Flow Wallet manages your EVM and your Cadence accounts on Flow. EVM accounts are compatible with EVM apps, and Cadence accounts are compatible with Cadence apps.
dialog.descriptionSecondary: If an application is on EVM or Cadence, only compatible accounts will be available to connect.

getStarted.title: Get started with Flow Wallet
getStarted.subtitle:
Welcome to Flow Wallet
Create an account to get started.
getStarted.termsAndPrivacy: By using Flow Wallet you agree to the terms of service and privacy policy

recoveryPhrase.title: Secured by a Recovery Phrase
recoveryPhrase.description: A recovery phrase is a series of words generated that will secure your wallet.

secureEnclave.title: Advanced
secureEnclave.cardDescription: Using device keys with hardware-grade security, Flow Wallet in secure mode is an ultra-secure hardware wallet you can trust. Only available for Cadence accounts on Flow.

dialog.title: Are you an advanced user?
dialog.description: Are you sure you want to create a Secure Profile? This will limit access to certain features and won't give you access to an EVM account on Flow.

notificationPreferences.title: Get push notifications
notificationPreferences.subtitle: Get notified when your transfers, swaps and approvals complete.

backupOptions.subtitle: Select how you'd like to backup your account to finish creating your account. You can change this later in settings.

deviceBackup.title: Create device backup
deviceBackup.description: Use your device as a backup wallet to safeguard your digital assets

cloudBackup.title: Create cloud backup
cloudBackup.description: Create a cloud backup with trusted providers like google drive and icloud

recoveryPhrase.title: Recovery phrase
recoveryPhrase.description: Write down these words in the right order and store them somewhere safe.

warning.title: Do not share your secret phrase!
warning.description:
If someone has your secret phrase,
They will have full control of your wallet.

confirmRecoveryPhrase.title: Confirm phrase
confirmRecoveryPhrase.description: Please select the word one by one referring to its order.
confirmRecoveryPhrase.wrongWord: Wrong word selected. Please try again.
